00004 typedef struct tree_node {
00005     struct tree_node * left, * right;
00006     int key;
00007     int size;   /* maintained to be the number of nodes rooted here */
00008 
00009     void *data;
00010 } splay_tree;

00014 LI_EXPORT splay_tree * splaytree_insert(splay_tree *t, int key, void *data);

00017 
00018 #define splaytree_size(x) (((x)==NULL) ? 0 : ((x)->size))
00019 /* This macro returns the size of a node.  Unlike "x->size",     */
00020 /* it works even if x=NULL.  The test could be avoided by using  */
00021 /* a special version of NULL which was a real node with size 0.  */
00022 
00023 
00024 #endif
